thread.title: IBERIABANK Partners with Zenmonics to Execute Omni-Channel Vision
thread.title_full: IBERIABANK Partners with Zenmonics to Execute Omni-Channel Vision

author: Chris Siemasko
title: IBERIABANK Partners with Zenmonics to Execute Omni-Channel Vision
text:
IBERIABANK and Zenmonics Inc. today announced an agreement to deploy Zenmonics’ channelUNITED™ solution, an Omni-Channel platform, giving IBERIABANK the ability to offer cross-channel account openings and scheduled appointments, while bringing sales and servicing mobility to branch associates. Highlights include:
channelUNITED™ platform will provide cross-channel account opening and appointment setting; mobileBANKER tablet application will enhance sales and servicing both inside and outside the branch; and Zenmonics’ unique Omni-Channel platform capabilities will allow IBERIABANK to execute its strategy of offering client-centric solutions in a cost-effective manner
“This is our first step in implementing solutions that ensure the digital experience for our clients is consistent with our associate-facing applications. The Zenmonics solution gives us a true Omni-Channel experience through which our associates and clients conduct transactions in a similar fashion,” said Andrew Hovet, Director of Delivery Channels at IBERIABANK.
Hovet continued, “IBERIABANK is committed to providing a seamless experience for clients throughout our digital channels and within our branches. We also seek to streamline the account open process for clients and eliminate the paper clutter through e-signature capture and digital documentation.”
“IBERIABANK has been a client-focused innovation leader and has always selected partners to provide differentiation where it matters,” said Riaz Syed, CEO for Zenmonics. “We are very pleased to partner with IBERIABANK as they begin the execution of their Omni-Channel vision.”
Zenmonics’ mobileBANKER application is part of its channelUNITED™ platform, which provides financial institutions with a common architecture to deliver features to clients and employees and comes integrated with Jack Henry’s jXchange for Silverlake, IBERIABANK’s current core system. channelUNITED™ will evolve IBERIABANK from prior silo multi-channel applications to an Omni-Channel experience for both clients and associates.
About IBERIABANK
With $19.2 billion in assets, IBERIABANK Corporation is a financial holding company with 280 combined offices, including 187 bank branch offices and three loan production offices in Louisiana, Arkansas, Tennessee, Alabama, Texas, and Florida, 22 title insurance offices in Arkansas and Louisiana, and mortgage representatives in 59 locations in 10 states. IBERIABANK has eight locations with representatives of IBERIA Wealth Advisors in four states, and one IBERIA Capital Partners, L.L.C. office in New Orleans.
About Zenmonics
Zenmonics is a global technology services and product company serving the banking and financial technology market. We specialize in omni-channel integration, bank technologies and mobility solutions for the financial services industry – from small community banks and credit unions to the world’s largest financial services organizations. Zenmonics is headquartered in Charlotte, N.C., with additional offices in Hyderabad, Mumbai and Bangalore, India.
